compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Equipment, Software, Training, Transportation, Mileage, Shipping, Employee engagement, Insurance
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: AYP HR GROUP COMPANY LIMITED, CÔNG TY TNHH DỊCH VỤ SIGMA, GOGLOBAL VIETNAM COMPANY LIMITED, CÔNG TY TNHH TIGER CONSULTING VIỆT NAM, GoGlobal
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Approved expenses can be paid to worker as NET and grossed up if they are not tax-free. Tax exemptions will only be applied to purely business related elements

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: AYP HR GROUP COMPANY LIMITED, CÔNG TY TNHH DỊCH VỤ SIGMA, GOGLOBAL VIETNAM COMPANY LIMITED, CÔNG TY TNHH TIGER CONSULTING VIỆT NAM
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: For those cost without eligible invoice/Proof document or rejected for claim, Corporate Income Tax (20%) will be charged as per current regulations
Mileage rates must be stipulated in Labor contract in order to be tax exempt

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: CÔNG TY TNHH DỊCH VỤ SIGMA
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Generally the rate is set at VND 1,600 per kilometer for cars
Per diem policy must be stipulated in Labor contract in order to be tax exempt

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Include details (date of expense, business purpose, and merchant name) in the expense submission

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Equipment, Software, Training, Transportation, Mileage, Shipping, Employee engagement

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Convert amount in local currency and include currency & exchange rate used for foreign currency expenses

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: AYP HR GROUP COMPANY LIMITED, CÔNG TY TNHH DỊCH VỤ SIGMA, GOGLOBAL VIETNAM COMPANY LIMITED, CÔNG TY TNHH TIGER CONSULTING VIỆT NAM, GoGlobal
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: For mileage reimbursements, include To and Fro locations, distance travelled and per diem rates
Expense submission must have an itemized report along with clear receipts

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: AYP HR GROUP COMPANY LIMITED, CÔNG TY TNHH DỊCH VỤ SIGMA, GOGLOBAL VIETNAM COMPANY LIMITED, CÔNG TY TNHH TIGER CONSULTING VIỆT NAM
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Where invoices do not have clear details e.g. written as "Meal and Drink cost", the worker must also submit a detailed list of each item as supporting document

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: AYP HR GROUP COMPANY LIMITED, CÔNG TY TNHH DỊCH VỤ SIGMA, GOGLOBAL VIETNAM COMPANY LIMITED, CÔNG TY TNHH TIGER CONSULTING VIỆT NAM
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Air Ticket claims must include the Boarding Pass, the flight ticket and a red invoice

Air tickets should be supported with itinerary in the name of employee or the invoice issued by travel agency in the name of employer. If the employee purchases travelling insurance, the quota invoice issued by insurance company is acceptable

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: AYP HR GROUP COMPANY LIMITED, CÔNG TY TNHH DỊCH VỤ SIGMA, GOGLOBAL VIETNAM COMPANY LIMITED, CÔNG TY TNHH TIGER CONSULTING VIỆT NAM
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: If hotel invoice cannot show unit, quantity, unit price per night, total cost information, then booking details with red stamp of hotel must also be submitted
Accommodation fee should be supported with the invoice and the detailed bill

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: AYP HR GROUP COMPANY LIMITED, CÔNG TY TNHH DỊCH VỤ SIGMA, GOGLOBAL VIETNAM COMPANY LIMITED, CÔNG TY TNHH TIGER CONSULTING VIỆT NAM
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Railway tickets in Vietnam have a specific purple pink color and can thus be used to replace the Tax invoice at any rates. When an online booking method is used, the electronic invoice with the Boarding Pass must be submitted. A booking reference or receipt will not be accepted instead of bus ticket
Ground transportation fee shall be supported with the taxi invoice. If the employee uses Grab/Bee or other apps to call a car, both invoices and trip details are necessary to be submitted

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: AYP HR GROUP COMPANY LIMITED, CÔNG TY TNHH DỊCH VỤ SIGMA, GOGLOBAL VIETNAM COMPANY LIMITED, CÔNG TY TNHH TIGER CONSULTING VIỆT NAM
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Worker will need to contact Papaya who will arrange for the Local Employer to reimburse via bank transfer to Vendor. Payment documents must include Service/Sales Contract, Liquidation Agreement signed by Local Employer and stamped. It could take up to 2 weeks to process these payments
VAT/Red receipts must be posted to: Hoàng Như Ngọc (0979737268) – 7.03 Newtown apartment, Hiep Binh Chanh ward, Thủ Đức, HCMC
VAT/Red receipts must be posted to: No 67, Mertia Khang Dien, Lien Phuong Street, Phuong Long B Ward, Thu Duc City – Ho Chi Minh City

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: CÔNG TY TNHH TIGER CONSULTING VIỆT NAM
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: VAT/Red receipts must be posted to: Address: Số 2, Đường Ngô Đức Kế, Phường Bến Nghé, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: AYP HR GROUP COMPANY LIMITED, CÔNG TY TNHH DỊCH VỤ SIGMA, GOGLOBAL VIETNAM COMPANY LIMITED, CÔNG TY TNHH TIGER CONSULTING VIỆT NAM
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Worker should ask the vendor to split the invoice/Receipt and use different dates on them

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: AYP HR GROUP COMPANY LIMITED, CÔNG TY TNHH DỊCH VỤ SIGMA, GOGLOBAL VIETNAM COMPANY LIMITED, CÔNG TY TNHH TIGER CONSULTING VIỆT NAM, GoGlobal
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Review submitted expense reports and approve expense claims, ensuring all required supporting documents have been included by the agreed cutoff date
